title: WICH ONE ☺☺
body: Helloooo! So, i want to choose some champions, and i don't know wich one. i have {{champion:222}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:163}}  So 3 adc and 1 mid. I want know wich one is the best to play, and if is possible help me for play it lol ♥ AND NOW IM GOING TO PLAY JINX AND TO DO THE FIRE EVERYWHERE {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}}

replies.body:
Right now Caitlin is sitting very pretty in the meta. She is very safe, has consistent DPS with AOE dmg output thanks to the commonly used hurricane build. She also has long range, traps, a slow and gapclose and very long range execute. This makes her SUPER safe as a pick in a majority of team compositions and is one of the easier ADC's to play in general.

Aside from that she is just pretty strong overall for ADC's at the moment.

Personally, I like Jinx because at some point in the game, you just do AOE crits and melt the enemy team from a safe range. It feels really good. Plus, her attack speed buff makes CSing and getting objectives a whole lot easier.
